Package model.parser

package model.parser
The model.parser package contains classes and interfaces for parsing schema files and converting them into SchemaModel objects. This package supports multiple file formats, including JSON and XML, and provides a uniform interface for schema parsing.

This package is designed to handle different schema file formats, allowing developers to use a consistent approach to convert schema files into a model representation that can be used for further processing.

Key classes and interfaces include:

  • SchemaParser: An interface defining the contract for schema parsers, requiring a method to parse a schema file into a SchemaModel.
  • JsonParser: A concrete implementation of SchemaParser that parses JSON schema files into SchemaModel objects.
  • XMLParser: A concrete implementation of SchemaParser that parses XML schema files into SchemaModel objects. The implementation also includes predefined schema structures for student-course relationships.

Example usage:

     // Create a parser factory or instantiate a parser directly
     SchemaParser parser = new JsonParser();
     
     // Parse a schema file
     File schemaFile = new File("schema.json");
     SchemaModel schemaModel;
     try {
         schemaModel = parser.parse(schemaFile);
         System.out.println("Parsed schema: " + schemaModel);
     } catch (SchemaParsingException e) {
         System.err.println("Error parsing schema: " + e.getMessage());
     }
Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    model
    The model package contains the core data structures and logic for representing and managing database schemas.
    model.exception
    The model.exception package contains custom exceptions used for error handling within the schema parsing and processing framework.
    model.factory
    The model.factory package contains factory classes responsible for creating instances of generators and parsers used in schema processing.
    model.generator
    The model.generator package contains classes and interfaces for generating SQL scripts from schema models.
  • Class
    Description
    JsonParser
    The JsonParser class is responsible for parsing JSON schema files and converting them into a SchemaModel object.
    SchemaParser
    The SchemaParser interface defines the contract for parsing schema files into a SchemaModel.
    XMLParser
    The XMLParser class is responsible for parsing XML schema files and converting them into a SchemaModel object.
